description: The Center for Medicare (CM) has created a standard analytical file intended to promote transparency. For each Value Modifier performance year, CM will publish a Public Use File (PUF) that contains Value Modifier performance results of de-identified practices. CM provides supporting documentation for each PUF that contains the field name, length, type, label, description, and notes for each variable included in the PUF.
keyword: Publically Available Data File - for download
title: Value Modifier Public Use File
